title: VA - (IBM) ITALIAN BODY MUSIC VOL.1 (2005)
description:
VA - (IBM) ITALIAN BODY MUSIC VOL.1 (2005)

ITALIAN BODY MUSIC

a project by Dj NOX and Luca Anselmi (ElectroWorld)

Title: IBM Vol.1 - ITALIAN BODY MUSIC
Genre: Electro, EBM, Industrial, Industrial Metal
Release date: 27.06.2005

FREE NET RELEASE

Visit www.italianbodymusic.com for free download and more infos about the bands.


Tracklist:
01. Alien Vampires - The Crop Circle
02. Blank - Xtinction II
03. Carmilla - Lilith
04. Cybertron - Planet Cybertron
05. Dope Stars Inc - 10000watts (Club Version)
06. Mental Siege - @#ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â§-2%^
07. No Forgiveness - Hate Gate (Raw Mix)
08. S.H.A.Y.T.A.N. - Adr[e]naline (Demo Version)
09. Syrian - Future Storm (Club Edit)
10. T3chn0ph0b1a - Wrapped in Eternit
11. XP8 - Dreamt Of Blue [EW Version]


--------------------                    --------------------                    --------------------

This compilation was born from the common interest and dedication of Alberto Brandi (Dj Nox, one of south ItalyÃƒÂ¢??s prime-mover EBM - Industrial DJs) and Luca Anselmi (founder and administrator of one of ItalyÃƒÂ¢??s major EBM - Industrial - Electro forum - webzine www.electroworld.tk) for the musical macrocosm related to the dark and alternative electronic music. The ÃƒÂ¢??IBMÃƒÂ¢?? project wants especially to work as a way to actively promote the Italian scene, very articulate and various in its manifestations, ranging from 80ÃƒÂ¢??s related synth-pop to the new ways of 2000 Electronic Body Music, arriving to interesting mingling between metal sounds and electronic impressions.

ÃƒÂ¢??Italian Body MusicÃƒÂ¢?? can be interpreted as a manifesto of the EBM-Electro made in Italy, somehow a confutation of the Italian xenophile complex, presenting some of the most promising and interesting acts from our Peninsula. This is not meant only for the hardcore-fans of the genre, but (mostly!) to the newcomers, in Italy and abroad.

In this spirit, the compilation presents tracks from already internationally-accomplished bands as well as young and promising acts that truly deserve to be listened, appreciated and supported through purchasing their records, merchandising and making the hell break loose at their concerts.

What to say more?

IBM itÃƒÂ¢??s promotion, circulation, electro-pedagogy!

IBM itÃƒÂ¢??s passion, stubbornness, sweat!

IBM itÃƒÂ¢??s damned fine music!

So, move your ass and dance to the sound of the Italian Body Music!!
